column2: 《HKEx》- 87001 HUI XIAN REIT - ELECTION BY THE MANAGER FOR BASE FEE AND VARIABLE FEE TO BE PAID BY WAY OF CASH AND UNITS IN HUI XIAN REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST
